title: Generated Use Case
preconditions: System does not have access to the user's credentials
main_flow: User navigates to the site and enters their username and password.
System checks if credentials are valid.
If credentials are valid, system redirects the user to the home page.
4. If credentials are not valid, system displays an error message.
User navigates to the site and enters their username and wrong password.
System checks if credentials are valid.
If credentials are valid, system redirects the user to the login page.
4. If credentials are not valid, system displays an error message.
postconditions: User is redirected to the login page if credentials are not valid.
System is notified of successful login if credentials are valid.
User may lose their login credentials if system is compromised.
User may not receive an error message if credentials are valid.
System may not check for valid credentials even if user tries to access a restricted page.
